data.question: What is the nominal diameter of the glass capillary used for loading the powder sample of Ag(pyz)2S2O8 for Synchrotron XRD measurements?
What temperature range was used for zero-field cooling the sample during T-dependent magnetization measurements?
Is the highest occupied band of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) in the non-spin polarized state half-filled?
What method was used for first principles DFT electronic band structure calculations for Ag(pyz)2(S2O8)?
data.answer: The frozen-core projector augmented wave method

data.question: What does a nonzero U on Ag indicate in the context of GGA+U calculations for Ag(pyz)2(S2O8)?
data.answer: It is necessary to have a bandgap at the Fermi level

data.question: Are the two nearest-neighbor spin exchange interactions in Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) antiferromagnetic according to DFT calculations?
What is the base temperature achieved during isothermal pulsed-field magnetization studies?
Was the structure of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) confirmed before or after obtaining a nearly pure sample of the material?
What is the significance of the value of U in GGA+U calculations for Ag(pyz)2(S2O8)?
data.answer: It affects the presence of a bandgap at the Fermi level

data.question: What was the purpose of using a robust technique for the refinement of the crystal structure of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8)?
data.answer: To refine the structure in the presence of impurity phases

data.question: Did the initial preparations of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) consist of multiple phases?
What was the probe field used for χ vs T measurements of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8)?
Is the highest occupied band of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) composed of Ag 4d and N 2p orbitals?
What was the sample mounted on for muon-spin relaxation measurements?
data.answer: An Ag backing plate in 25 µm Ag foil

data.question: What does the presence of significant AFM interactions in Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) suggest about its magnetic properties?
data.answer: It suggests that the material exhibits antiferromagnetism

data.question: Was the disappearing phase of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) indexed as space group C2/c?
What does the transformation and associated change in peak intensity in the diffraction pattern of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) indicate?
data.answer: It made separation of the disappearing phase possible within the diffraction pattern

data.question: Are the highest occupied and the lowest unoccupied bands of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) characterized by the x2-y2 orbitals of Ag 4d?
What was the magnetic field charged to during T-dependent magnetization measurements of Ag(pyz)2(S2O8)?
What does the calculation of J2D/kB values for Ag(pyz)2(S2O8) help determine?
data.answer: The antiferromagnetic nature of the nearest-neighbor spin exchange interactions
